title: OpenDevin Rebrands to OpenHands
content: OpenDevin rebrands to OpenHands, continuing its mission to provide open-source autonomous AI software engineering capabilities to developers worldwide.

title: Introducing ChatGPT search - OpenAI
content: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT search, a new feature for deep research and analysis of code repositories on GitHub.
summary: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT search, a new feature for deep research and analysis of code repositories on GitHub.

title: StackBlitz Bolt Achieves Unprecedented $4M ARR in 30 Days After Near-Shutdown
content: StackBlitz nearly shut down before pivoting to Bolt, an AI app builder that achieved $4 million ARR in just 30 days, demonstrating explosive demand for autonomous development tools.
summary: StackBlitz nearly shut down before pivoting to Bolt, an AI app builder that achieved $4 million ARR in just 30 days, demonstrating explosive demand for autonomous development tools.

title: GitHub Copilot Introduces Multi-Model Support and Coding Agents
content: GitHub has launched multi-model Copilot supporting Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini alongside GPT-4, plus new autonomous coding agents for complex tasks.
summary: GitHub has launched multi-model Copilot supporting Claude 3.5 Sonnet and Gemini alongside GPT-4, plus new autonomous coding agents for complex tasks.

title: Bringing developer choice to Copilot with Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro, and OpenAI's o1-preview and o1-mini
content: GitHub is bringing developer choice to Copilot by integrating Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro, and OpenAI's o1-preview and o1-mini models. This integration aims to provide developers with a broad choice of models suited for development tasks.
summary: GitHub is bringing developer choice to Copilot by integrating Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro, and OpenAI's o1-preview and o1-mini models. This integration aims to provide developers with a broad choice of models suited for development tasks.

title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet on GitHub Copilot
content: Claude 3.5 Sonnet is now available on GitHub Copilot, offering advanced coding capabilities. It excels in solving real-world GitHub issues and achieving top scores in benchmarks like SWE-bench Verified and HumanEval. The integration allows developers to write production-ready code, debug with inline chat, create tests from implementation, and understand code with contextual explanations.
summary: Claude 3.5 Sonnet is now available on GitHub Copilot, offering advanced coding capabilities. It excels in solving real-world GitHub issues and achieving top scores in benchmarks like SWE-bench Verified and HumanEval. The integration allows developers to write production-ready code, debug with inline chat, create tests from implementation, and understand code with contextual explanations.

title: New from Universe 2024: Get the latest previews and releases
content: The article provides an overview of the latest previews and releases from GitHub Universe '24, including updates to GitHub Copilot and the introduction of new AI-native tools.
summary: The article provides an overview of the latest previews and releases from GitHub Universe '24, including updates to GitHub Copilot and the introduction of new AI-native tools.

title: GitHub Embraces Developer Choice with Multi-Model Copilot, New App Tool GitHub Spark, and AI-Native Developer Experience
content: GitHub announced the next evolution of its Copilot-powered developer platform at GitHub Universe '24. The platform now offers multi-model Copilot, enabling developers to choose from industry-leading models like Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro, and OpenAI's GPT-4o, o1-preview, and o1-mini. Additionally, GitHub introduced GitHub Spark, an AI-native tool for building web apps in natural language, and updated Copilot in VS Code, Copilot Workspace, GitHub Models, and Copilot...
summary: GitHub announced the next evolution of its Copilot-powered developer platform at GitHub Universe '24. The platform now offers multi-model Copilot, enabling developers to choose from industry-leading models like Anthropic's Claude 3.5 Sonnet, Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro, and OpenAI's GPT-4o, o1-preview, and o1-mini. title: AI at Wharton: Full Report

title: Replit, CodeSandbox, and Glitch Unveil Enhanced AI Coding Capabilities
content: The merged entity of Replit, CodeSandbox, and Glitch has unveiled significant enhancements to their AI coding capabilities. These updates include advanced auto-completion features, improved debugging tools, and enhanced collaboration features. The platforms aim to make coding more efficient and enjoyable for developers of all levels.
summary: The merged entity of Replit, CodeSandbox, and Glitch has unveiled significant enhancements to their AI coding capabilities. These updates include advanced auto-completion features, improved debugging tools, and enhanced collaboration features. The platforms aim to make coding more efficient and enjoyable for developers of all levels.

title: Watch Webinar: Introducing Codeium AI + Demo - ALMtoolbox
content: Codeium hosted a webinar in October 2024 to introduce its AI features and provide a demo. The webinar covered various aspects of generative AI for developers, including autocomplete, chat, and context-aware AI. It also highlighted Codeium's ability to function in on-prem and air-gapped environments.
summary: Codeium hosted a webinar in October 2024 to introduce its AI features and provide a demo. The webinar covered various aspects of generative AI for developers, including autocomplete, chat, and context-aware AI. It also highlighted Codeium's ability to function in on-prem and air-gapped environments.

title: Glitch Joins Replit and CodeSandbox in AI Coding Platform Consolidation
content: Glitch, another prominent coding platform, has announced its integration with the newly merged Replit and CodeSandbox. This consolidation aims to create a robust ecosystem for AI-driven coding tools, offering developers a wide range of features and functionalities. The move is seen as a strategic step towards dominating the coding platform market.

The move is seen as a strategic step towards dominating the coding platform market.

title: Replit and CodeSandbox Merge to Create a Unified AI Coding Platform
content: Replit and CodeSandbox have announced a merger to create a unified AI coding platform. The combined entity aims to leverage the strengths of both platforms to provide a more comprehensive and innovative coding experience. This move is expected to enhance the capabilities of AI-driven coding tools and improve the overall developer experience.
